field.name: artistcat
field.label: Select a 2.5 Category
field.query: SELECT id AS value, title as artistcat FROM #__categories WHERE extension='com_mymuse'

field.name: genrecat
field.label: Select a 2.5 Category
field.query: SELECT id AS value, title as genrecat FROM #__categories WHERE extension='com_mymuse'

field.name: oldartistcat
field.label: Select a 1.5 Section/Artists
field.query: SELECT id AS value, title as oldartistcat FROM jos_sections WHERE scope='com_mymuse'

field.name: oldgenrecat
field.label: Select a 1.5 Section/Catalog/Genres
field.query: SELECT id AS value, title as oldgenrecat FROM jos_sections WHERE scope='com_mymuse'
